name: blob.ex (Blinkiscoding) (Blinkiscoding)
description:
A and D to move left and right, and W to jump. To spawn a clone, you have to press C. You have to wait 5 seconds before spawning a clone in again. Every time you push a clone into the hole, you will gain a point. There will also be gems that will fall from the sky. If you collect a certain amount of gems, the amount of time for you to spawn a clone will decrease. Pushing a clone into lava will give you 2 points and pushing a clone into water will decrease your score by one.  Have Fun!

This game was made with Natan, Selina, Anna, and Chris.
